column4: if I choose the amd 64 version of ubuntu I will get trouble compiling and running x86 programs?
compiling ? do you know what compiling is
yes I used to run gentoo before, I have gotten lazy =)
that doesn't say much ,  Gentoo is just as easy as any other distro
ok, but I was running gentoo 64bit before and tried running an 32bit environment inside it and it was a lot of trouble setting it up straight.
a lot of programs I run usually only release the source code so I have to compile them and they only support 32bit.
